verbose_text: Our western blot analysis results revealed that EGCG significantly enhanced the expression levels of Nrf-2, HO-1, and NQO-1 in rat lung tissues compared with radiation-only and DEX treated rats, thereby confirming the results of Sriram et al and Sahin et al as well as supporting our hypothesis that EGCG relieves oxidative stress by activating Nrf2 and its associated antioxidant enzymes.
evidence: levels of Nrf-2, HO-1, and NQO-1
